docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Medical Costs Surge as Hospitals Force Insurers to Raise Payments'' (front page, May 25):
docs.abstract: Dr Jesse S Sethi letter says culprits in soaring medical costs are not hospitals but very advances in technology and pharmacology that public demands and deserves (S)
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''Medical Costs Surge as Hospitals Force Insurers to Raise Payments'' (front page, May 25):
